slide.title: Lab Goals
slide.p: The purpose of this lab is to help you explore and practice XML document constraining and construction, from lessons xml01 and xml02.
Suggestion: you may want to skim the slideshow first, before working your way through it.

slide.title: Lab Submission
slide.p: Your lab will be completed in a github repository. This will be your (forked) starter-lab06 repo.
Please make sure that your work is in the "master" branch or your repository, and that any other branches have been merged into it.
Submit a readme or comment to the lab dropbox, with. a link to your github repository.

slide.title: Lab Marking Guideline
slide.p: Simple ... 4 marks for building your DTD correctly, 2 marks for each of the order files prescribed in the tutorial :)

slide.title: Your Job
slide.p: This will result in a DTD and three valid XML documents.
